Why Sphinx? ğŸˆÂ¶

I chose Sphinx to create this website for several reasons:

  1. Documentations are important, I have to start doing it. You have to start doing it too.

  2. Iâ€™m only displaying information here, nothing more. Sphinx is great in creating this boilerplates.

  3. After compiling ReST/MD files, I still can change the HTML codes. Which is very convenient

  4. There is an elegant search bar on the top-left corner (depends on your screen size, but you know what I mean).

  5. You can easily change templates. Iâ€™m currently using sphinx_rtd_theme a.k.a. the most beautiful Sphinx theme.

  6. Itâ€™s beautiful. Again. I like this theme a lot.

  7. Itâ€™s simple. Very simple, to be honest.

How simple you may ask?

Click â€œView page sourceâ€ on the top-right corner to see how simple this is. It contains the ReST/MD files that are being converted into these HTML sites. It does not restrict my freedom because HTML files are not that deeply stored inside the folders nor is it messy.
